member.name: M:WorkSampleBookSearch.BooksXmlController.GetBookItem(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns a Book item matching the given id.
member.param: Id of item to be retrieved

member.name: M:WorkSampleBookSearch.BooksXmlController.PostBookItem(WorkSampleBookSearch.Model.BookItem)
member.returns: Inserts new Book item in books.xml and saves the file

member.name: M:WorkSampleBookSearch.BooksXmlController.PostBookItem(System.Int64,WorkSampleBookSearch.Model.BookItem)
member.summary: Updates a Book item matching the given id.
member.param: Id of item to be retrieved
member.returns: Updates Book item in books.xml and saves the file

member.name: M:WorkSampleBookSearch.BooksXmlController.DeleteBookItem(System.Int64)
member.summary: Delete a Book item matching the given id.
member.param: Id of item to be retrieved
member.returns: Deletes item from books.xml and saves the file
